text: Abdul Matin Chaudhary was a Member of the 1st National Assembly of Pakistan as a representative of East Pakistan. ==Career== Chaudhary was a Member of the Constituent Assembly of Pakistan. He had served as a Minister in the Bengal provincial government during British Rule. ==Death== Chaudhary died in 1947. ==References== Category:Pakistani MNAs 1947–1954 Category:1947 deaths
title: Abdul Matin Chaudhary
